entry.string: Execution halted: the role with uid #(1) has an empty name. This needs to be corrected manually in the database.
entry.translation: Execooshun helted: zee rule-a veet ueed #(1) hes un impty neme-a. Thees needs tu be-a currected munooelly in zee detebese-a.

entry.string: Execution halted: the role with uid #(1) has an empty name or user name. This needs to be corrected manually in the database.
entry.translation: Execooshun helted: zee rule-a veet ueed #(1) hes un impty neme-a oor user neme-a. Thees needs tu be-a currected munooelly in zee detebese-a.
